RumorFact.Text: A planet in the solar system. I heard there was something interesting on the equator.

ExploreFact.Text: A mysterious, large door at the capital. The Nomai says they haven't been able to open it for centuries.
I convinced every clan to contribute their shard, but we're still missing one.

AltText.Text: I have every piece of the key: one from each of the four clans and the lost Fifth Shard.

ExploreFact.Text: When I put the last shard in, the key glowed and the door opened.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Greed.
A Nomai told me that, to see their leader, I have to prove my worth by stealing something from one of the southern clans.
The Nomai said that there isn't anything good to steal right now.

AltText.Text: The Nomai said that I need to steal the sacred shrubbery from the southern clan I visited.

ExploreFact.Text: The leader of the Followers of Greed agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Exploration.
One of the Nomai told me I had to give them a cockpit to see their leader.
The leader of the Followers of Exploration agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Ghird village on the south side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Worship.
One of the Ghirds said I had to find the lost sacred shrubbery to see their leader.
The leader of the Followers of Worship agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Ghird village on the south side of the planet. They call themselves the Followers of Logic.
The Ghird at the leader's house told me I had to return when a "ray of sun rests upon this building."
The leader of the Followers of Logic agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai at the Great Door told me there was a fifth shard of the key that went missing.
The leader of the Followers of Exploration told me that the fifth shard was on the North Pole.
The leader of the Followers of Greed told me that the correct stone is tainted with blood.
The leader of the Followers of Worship told me that if I wanted to reach the fifth shard the stone has to be on top of the shortest pillar.
The leader of the Followers of Logic told me that if I wanted to reach the fifth shard I need to attach a light to the stone.

ExploreFact.Text: The final piece of the key to the Great Door. I found it on the North Pole locked behind a puzzle with quantum rocks.
